channel.title: Need someone to help with making my portal work
channel.description:
Please can someone walk me through how to make my portal work please?
I know the code should be: "case 2468: // Portal At Front. teleportToX = 2358; teleportToY = 4959; sendMessage("You teleport to the Non-Combat Training grounds."); break;"
But when i put that in i got 100 errors.
Please can someone tell me exactly what to do?
Thanks, Jake :D
p.s i have looked everywhere for tuts and none of them seems to help as i always get errors.

item.title: Need someone to help with making my portal work
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

Please can someone walk me through how to make my portal work please?

I know the code should be:
“case 2468: // Portal At Front.
teleportToX = 2358;
teleportToY = 4959;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the Non-Combat Training grounds.”);
break;”

But when i put that in i got 100 errors.

Please can someone tell me exactly what to do?

Thanks,
Jake

p.s i have looked everywhere for tuts and none of them seems to help as i always get errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to help with making my portal work
